Detailed Description

Implementation of image smooth operator with homogeneous rectangle kernel.

This implementation uses moving average alghorithm.

Do image processing with some (optional) parameter set.

Parameters:
parameterPtrextracted parameter set, it can be NULL.
inputImageinput image should be processed.
outputImageoutput image, where processing results will be stored.
